text: Bérénice Bejo (born July 7, 1976) is a French and Argentine actress. She played Peppy Miller in The Artist (2011). For that role, she was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress. She also played Christiana in A Knight's Tale (2001). Bejo was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina. ==References== Category:Argentine movie actors Category:French movie actors Category:Actors from Buenos Aires Category:1976 births Category:Living people
title: Bérénice Bejo
